title: [Feature] [Testing] Add IT to cover ShardingSphere DistSQL usage
description:
Search before asking

  • I had searched in the issues and found no similar feature requirement.

Description

We are using DistSQL in Sharding-MySQL storage option, but DistSQL is a new tech stack, and not stable.

The stability concern is noticed from 5.1.2 to 5.2.x version bumping. We have successfully passed all tests in 5.1.2 but failed in all 5.2 dev and released versions.

So, in order to ease the ShardingSphere community verification, we could build an Integration Testing based on test container similar to ElasticSearch client test.
